title.bibl: Saloniki, Jan. 13, 1923. An Open Invitation from the Chicago Greek Consulate(Editorial)

div.bibl: Saloniki, Jan. 13, 1923. AN OPEN INVITATION FROM THE CHICAGO GREEK CONSULATE(Editorial)

body.p: To celebrate the advent of the New Year, the consul general, Mr. Vasilios Mammonas, invites the members of the local Greek community with their esteemed families to the Greek consulate in the Transportation Building on Dearborn Street.
He desires that all who belong to the Chicago Greek colony may accord him the pleasure and the honor of their presence.
(From the office of the Greek Consulate)
